common algorithms

hydroroot.main.hydroroot(primary_length=0.15, delta=0.002, beta=0.25, order_max=5, segment_length=0.0001, nude_length=0.02, seed=2, ref_radius=0.0001, order_decrease_factor=0.7, k0=300, Jv=0.1, psi_e=0.4, psi_base=0.1, length_data=None, axial_conductivity_data=None, radial_conductivity_data=None, n=None)[source]

Simulate a root system and compute global conductance and flux.

see hydroroot_mtg and hydroroot_flow

hydroroot.main.hydroroot_flow(g, segment_length=0.0001, k0=300, Jv=0.1, psi_e=0.4, psi_base=0.1, axial_conductivity_data=None, radial_conductivity_data=None)[source]

Flux and equivalent conductance calculation

Parameters

  • (MTG) (- g) –

  • length (- segment_length (Float) the MTG segment) –

  • used (- k0 (Float) not) –

  • (microL/s) (- Jv (Float) flux in) –

  • (MPa) (- psi_base (Float) hydrostatic potential at the root base) –

  • (MPa) –

  • tip (- radial_conductivity_data (list of Float) k vs distance to) –

  • tip –

Returns

  • - g (MTG) (the MTG with the following properties filled: K (axial conductance), k (radial donductivity),) – j (radial flux), J_out (axial flux), psi_in and psi_out (hydrostatic pressure into the root at the input and output of a MTG node

  • - Keq (float) (the equivalent conductance of the whole root)

  • - Jv_global (float) (the outgoing flux at the root base)

hydroroot.main.hydroroot_from_data(primary_length=0.15, delta=0.002, beta=0.25, order_max=5, segment_length=0.0001, nude_length=0.02, seed=2, ref_radius=0.0001, order_decrease_factor=0.7, k0=300, Jv=0.1, psi_e=0.4, psi_base=0.1, length_data=None, axial_conductivity_data=None, radial_conductivity_data=None, primary_length_data=None, lateral_length_data=None)[source]

Reconstruct a root system and compute global conductance and flux.

Parameters

  • primary_length_data (list Float) data with the lateral positions from the base

  • lateral_length_data (list Float) data with the lateral lengths

see hydroroot_mtg and hydroroot_flow for the other parameters

hydroroot.main.hydroroot_mtg(primary_length=0.15, delta=0.002, beta=0.25, order_max=5, segment_length=0.0001, nude_length=0.02, seed=2, ref_radius=0.0001, order_decrease_factor=0.7, length_data=None, n=None, **kwds)[source]

Simulate and generate a root system.

Parameters

  • length (- segment_length (Float) the MTG segment) –

  • length –

  • variability (- beta (Float) branching) –

  • variability) (random variability around delta (0.25 gives 25% of) –

  • maximum (- order_max (int) root order) –

  • length –

  • laterals (- nude_length (Float) distance to the tip without any) –

  • generator (- seed (int) the seed for the random) –

  • radius (- ref_radius (Float) the primary root) –

  • order (- order_decrease_factor (Float) the radius decrease factor applied when increasing) –

  • length_data (-) –

  • n (-) –

Returns

  • - g

  • - surface

  • - volume
